categories.general: Contains the general command for AutoCord interactions.
categories.reporting: Contains commands for reporting info to the admins
categories.misc: Contains commands that don't fit into the other categories.

general.name: bot
general.desc: Returns the link to a User Bot's information page.

general.name: library
general.desc: Returns the link to the index of all User Bots.

general.name: permissions
general.desc: Returns all permission values for a User Bot.

general.name: status
general.desc: Returns number of Online and Offline User Bots.

reporting.name: conflict
reporting.desc: Report the number of bots that share a prefix.

misc.name: ping
misc.desc: Pings the AutoCord bot and returns ping latency.
